segments.text: I see the little girl standing there, waiting for her brother to give her a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so hopeful, like those cookies are the only thing she wants in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit sad seeing her so eager, yet completely unaware of the danger her brother is in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just a little girl, standing there with her hand out, waiting for a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she realizes how dangerous the situation is, with her brother on that unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems so innocent, just wanting a cookie, not a care in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she doesn't get hurt if that stool tips over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water on the floor is another hazard, and she's just standing there, oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I want to protect her, to make sure she's safe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is so bittersweet, seeing her so happy yet in such a dangerous situation.
segments.speaker: PAR
